name.ja: <ruby>怒<rt>いか</rt></ruby>りの<ruby>業<rt>ごう</rt></ruby><ruby>火<rt>か</rt></ruby> エクゾード・フレイム

text.en:
If you control a Level 10 or higher "Exodia" monster: Destroy all cards your opponent controls. You can banish this card from your GY, except the turn it was sent there, then activate 1 of these effects;
● Add 1 "Forbidden One" monster from your Deck or GY to your hand.
● Shuffle up to 5 "Forbidden One" monsters from your GY and/or banishment into the Deck.
You can only use each effect of "Raging Hellfire - Exodo Flame" once per turn.
